name: Health & Life Skills
description: The Boys & Girls Clubs of SF empowers club members to make healthy choices for immediate and long-term health benefits, while setting themselves up for success in school. Every day at the Club, we provide nutritious snacks, fun, engaging fitness activities, and competitive sports, to get Club members excited about leading a healthy lifestyle. Also, through health education, we teach youth how to nurture their own wellbeing, helping them succeed in school and grow into happy and healthy adults. W

howToGetIt: Please contact your local Clubhouse for any questions and additional programs offered.
agency: Boys and Girls Clubs of San Francisco
